statements: DELETE FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE payment_id = 12345 AND policy_id = 56789;
DELETE FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE payment_date < '2021-01-01' AND amount >= 500.00;
DELETE FROM PremiumPayments WHERE policy_id = 123 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewed_by = 'John Doe' AND renewal_date >= '2023-06-15'
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1001 AND payment_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM policies WHERE policy_status = 'Inactive' AND policy_end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe';
